title: Rare! 2-bed down unit in desirable Westpark w/parking; Avail 10/1
map_address: 3275 Rocky River Drive near Edgecliff & Munn Avenues
posting_body: Downstairs, first-floor unit of a high-quality, two-family home.
Professionally updated and recently remodeled!
Beautifully maintained.
Tasteful paint colors, clean carpeting, newer windows, real wood blinds, A/C, solid brick exterior.
Two bedrooms plus one extra bonus room (office, study, den, TV/reading room, playroom), living room, dining room, eat-in kitchen, one full bathroom.
All kitchen appliances stay, including dishwasher.
Loads of storage.
Full basement rec room with your own newer, non-shared washer and dryer in basement.
Deep manicured back yard with deck.
Detached garage parking for 1 spot with electric door opener.

Wonderful location in highly desirable West Park neighborhood near Kamm's Shopping Plaza, Fairview Hospital, schools (Our Lady of Angels, St. Joseph's Academy, St. Mark's), airport, I-90, Lakewood, Rocky River, and Metroparks.
Also close to several churches and libraries.
Tenant responsible for all utilities, including water and sewer.
ABSOLUTELY NO PETS (only exception: service animal).
NO SMOKING.
Sorry, no Section 8 vouchers.
Minimum credit score: 675.
Subject to background check.
First month's rent, last month's rent, and security deposit all due upon signing.
Tours by appointment only.
Available October 1!
